channel.title: Getting clients to work for Windows Vista
channel.description:
This is the run.exe I currently have
[code] @echo off java -Xmx512m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui [/code]
I don't know how to get it working on Windows Vista. I do have a couple of friends that want to play but can't because of their computer set up.

item.title: Getting clients to work for Windows Vista
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

i would use a batch to exe program converter.

a sample one is here

http://www.battoexe.com/

Read full topic
item.source: Getting clients to work for Windows Vista
